kickstart.description: BIOTOOLS blat - http://genome.ucsc.edu bowtie - http://bowtie-bio.sourceforge.net bwa - http://bio-bwa.sourceforge.net GenomeAnalysisTK - http://www.broadinstitute.org/gsa/wiki/index.php/The_Genome_Analysis_Toolkit samtools - http://samtools.sourceforge.net soapdenovo - http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soapdenovo.html velvet - http://www.ebi.ac.uk/~zerbino/velvet/
